medium_description_en: Predicts likelihood of breast cancer with sentinel lymph node metastasis has also spread to additional lymph nodes.
short_description_en: Additional lymph node mets in breast CA.

seo.meta_description_en: The Additional Nodal Metastasis Nomogram predicts likelihood of breast cancer with sentinel lymph node metastasis has also spread to additional lymph nodes.
seo.keywords_en: breast ca, nodal mets, nodal metastasis, breast cancer, brca, additional nodal mets

about.formula_en: Multivariate nomogram, with assigned points to 8 criteria.

Original/Primary Reference.text: Specht MC, Kattan MW, Gonen M, Fey J, Van Zee KJ. Predicting nonsentinel node status after positive sentinel lymph biopsy for breast cancer: clinicians versus nomogram. Ann Surg Oncol. 2005 Aug;12(8):654-9.

Validation.text: Van Zee KJ, et. al. A nomogram for predicting the likelihood of additional nodal metastases in breast cancer patients with a positive sentinel node biopsy. Ann Surg Oncol. 2003 Dec;10(10):1140-51.

Other References.text: Goyal A, Douglas-Jones A, Newcombe RG, Mansel RE; ALMANAC Trialists Group. Predictors of non-sentinel lymph node metastasis in breast cancer patients. Eur J Cancer. 2004 Jul;40(11):1731-7.

creator_info.about_en: Kimberly J. Van Zee, MS, MD, is a surgical oncologist exclusively practicing and primarily researching topics within the realm of breast cancer treatment. She sees outpatients in the new Evelyn H. Lauder Breast Center and performs surgeries regularly. She has received the American Cancer Society's Clinical Oncology Career Development award, and is frequently in the New York Magazine's 'Best Doctors in New York.'

input_schema.label_en: Number of negative <abbr title='Sentinel Lymph Nodes'>SLN</abbr>s
input_schema.name: numneg

input_schema.label_en: Number of positive <abbr title='Sentinel Lymph Nodes'>SLN</abbr>s
input_schema.name: numpos

input_schema.label_en: Method of detection of <abbr title='Sentinel Lymph Nodes'>SLN</abbr> metastases
input_schema.name: meth

related_calcs.short_title_en: Gail Model for Breast CA Risk
